mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_no, m_name, m_pass, m_phone, m_regdate) values(#{m_id}, member_seq.nextval, #{m_name}, #{m_pass}, #{m_phone}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select m_id from member where m_name = #{m_name} and m_phone = #{m_phone}
select m_id from member where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update member set m_pass = #{m_pass} where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select m_id from member where m_id = #{m_id} and m_name = #{m_name} and m_phone = #{m_phone}
select m_id, m_no, m_name, m_pass, m_phone, m_regdate from member
select * from house where h_address like '%'||#{h_address}||'%' and h_state = 0 order by h_no desc

select * , SQRT( POWER(( #{lat} - pi_x) * 110979.309, 2) + POWER((#{lng} - pi_y) * 88907.949, 2) ) distance from house , (select #{lat} v_x , #{lng} v_y , 110979.309 r_x , 88907.949 r_y , 3000.000 v_distance from dual ) where SQRT( POWER((v_x - pi_x) * r_x, 2) + POWER((v_y - pi_y) * r_y, 2) ) "<"= v_distance and pi_x BETWEEN v_x - v_distance / r_x and v_x + v_distance / r_x and pi_y BETWEEN v_y - v_distance / r_y and v_y + v_distance / r_y order by distance
